derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin, egg white', from albus 'white'

entry.def: Albumen is the same as albumin .

means.word_mean: 1. a simple water-soluble protein found in many animal tissues and liquids
2. the white of an egg; the nutritive and protective gelatinous substance surrounding the yolk consisting mainly of albumin dissolved in water
